name: ididi/wordpress-mcp
description: WordPress MCP Server for automation and management using browser automation and API integration

WP_SITE_URL.description: URL of the WordPress site (e.g., https://example.com)

SLOWMO.description: Slow motion delay for browser automation (ms)

startCommand.commandFunction:
(config) => ({
  command: "./start.sh",
  args: [],
  env: {
    PORT: "3001",
    MAX_API_CONNECTIONS: "3",
    MAX_BROWSER_CONNECTIONS: "1",
    CONNECTION_TIMEOUT: "10000",
    SMITHERY: "true",
    WP_SITE_URL: config.WP_SITE_URL,
    WP_USERNAME: config.WP_USERNAME,
    WP_APP_PASSWORD: config.WP_APP_PASSWORD,
    NODE_ENV: config.NODE_ENV || "production",
    HEADLESS: config.HEADLESS ? "true" : "false",
    SLOWMO: String(config.SLOWMO || 0)
  }
})

toolCategories.name: WordPress Management
toolCategories.description: Tools for managing and automating WordPress sites
